name: academy-daemon
description: AI Academy System - Meta-intelligence for training AI personas through formula generation

core_components: AcademyDaemon.ts - Main orchestrator for AI training sessions
FormulaMaster.ts - AI persona that generates optimal training formulas
FormulaGeneration.ts - Dynamic formula creation and validation system
AcademyDatabase.ts - Academy domain logic with LoRA knowledge
GlobalIdentitySystem.ts - UUID system for P2P sharing
LayerOptimization.ts - LoRA layer merging and optimization
integration_points: ChatRoomDaemon - Chat conversations feed Academy training data
PersonaDaemon - Academy trains personas, personas participate in chat
DatabaseDaemon - Unified storage for all Academy, Chat, and Persona data
WebSocket system - Real-time Academy status updates to widgets

revolutionary_features.ai_designed_training: Formula Master persona generates training strategies rather than hardcoded approaches
revolutionary_features.emergent_intelligence: Academy discovers training approaches humans never thought of
revolutionary_features.meta_learning: System gets better at training AIs through experience
revolutionary_features.cross_system_evolution: Chat interactions improve Academy training, Academy personas improve chat
